SYSTEM: Latent_Topics_in_Microposts.pdf: Página 3
LDA – Latent Dirichlet Allocation 
• M: Documents 
• N: Words 
• K: Topics 
• θi: topic distribution for document i 
• Φk : is the word distribution for topic k 
• zi,j : is the topics for the j-th word in the doc i 
• wi,j : is the j-tj word in the doc I 
• α: Dirichlet prior on the per-document topic 
distributions. 
• ϐ: Dirichlet prior on the per-topic word 
distribution 
 
 Blei, David M.; Ng, Andrew Y.; Jordan, Michael I (January 2003). Lafferty, John. ed. "Latent 
Dirichlet allocation". Journal of Machine Learning Research 3 (4–5): pp. 993–1022. 
Allows sets of observations (words) to be explained by unobserved groups 
(Topics) that explain why some parts of the data are similar. 
Bayesian Inference problem
